---
name: issue-forms-and-templates
description: Design GitHub issue forms and templates that gather structured, actionable information.
---

# Issue Forms + Templates

## Principles
- Ask for reproducibility and expected behaviour.
- Capture environment and versions.
- Encourage minimal reproduction and logs/screenshots where relevant.
- Route support questions to Discussions/support channel if applicable.

## Templates included
- Bug report (form)
- Feature request (form)
- Documentation issue (form)
